item.description:
Organic Vegan Thanksgiving Feast: 43 Gifford Lane, Concord MA 01742 
10:30am-2:30pm cooking and setting up; 2:30pm-3:30pm feasting; 3:30pm-7pm games and clean up; 7pm Dessert! 
Menu Includes: 
Kamut Bread Centerpiece* 
Vegan Duck* 
Sage, Leek, Barley Dressing* 
Mashed Potatoes*
Yams*
Cranberry Sauce* 
Calabacitas*
Green Peas with minced Onion 
Vegan Eggnog*
Pumpkin Pie* 
Pecan Pie* 
Pure Decadence Soy Free Vanilla Bean Ice Cream*
Martinelli's Sparkling Cider 
Knudsens Sparkling Cherry Juice 
Knudsens Sparkling Pear Juice
* indicate that someone is bringing the dish. Please coordinate with Dushenka at 978-369-1459 what you will bring and how much kitchen time you need.  We will sit down for the meal at 2pm and eat dessert in the early evening, after the main meal has had some time to digest.

Check out last year's meetup listing for pictures from last year.
item.name: It's That Time of Year Again! Vegan Thanksgiving Feast!!!!
